Description:
The war continues and we finally arrive near Gorio's camp.

The platoon has had disagreements about how we have acted in the various events that have brought us to this point in the war.

The tension is palpable and now is the perfect time to rest for a while before the fight with chieftain Gorio.
DescriptionAction: As we rest, we wonder what everyone's opinion of Gorio is.

    "SSRewardText": "(Magnus) \"Queen Amelia's proposal to unify all the races of the kingdom and be able to live in harmony is the best for everyone.\n\nEven if I have to fight my own kind, I will do my best to make this unique opportunity come true.\"\n\n(Yogger) \"Captain, you've grown accustomed to life with humans and it's softened you up. You've been dosmesticated... Believe me, when this war is over, they won't thank you enough...\"",

    "SSRewardText": "(Yogger) \"We werewolves should be free and not have to ask permission to hunt in our forests. Humans want to turn us into their tame dogs... Well, they won't tame me!\n\nBut I think Gorio has made a big mistake in declaring open war on humans. The end of the war is near and it will not end until Gorio is overthrown.\"\n\n(Magnus) \"You seem to be clear that Gorio is our enemy and taking him down is the only option to end this war. Although sometimes I wonder if you didn't join the wrong side or what your real motives are...\"",
